name: Centaur Chieftain
movement: 50 feet walk speed, enabling quick engagement
description: A large monstrosity with a strong physique, combining human-like features with the lower body of a horse, often seen wielding a pike and equipped with a chain shirt and shield.
memorable: Its exceptional strength and the ability to command allies on the battlefield make it a formidable leader.
goals: To lead its allies in combat and maintain territorial control.
relations: Often commands other centaurs or savage beasts, possibly found in the company of chaotic allies.
environment: Typically found in forested or open grassy areas, often patrolling its territory.
strengths: High hit points and strong melee attacks, alongside the ability to bolster allies through Leadership.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence can make it predictable in battle, which can be exploited by smarter foes.
attacks: Can perform a multiattack with a lethal pike and powerful hooves, capable of significant damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Charge ability substantially increases damage output when moving quickly towards a target.
equipment: Equipped with a chain shirt and wielding a pike and longbow.
senses: Has a passive perception of 15, indicating keen awareness of surroundings.
skills: Proficient in athletics, perception, and survival, showcasing strong physical capabilities.
additional_information: Leadership ability enhances allies' attack and saving throws.
Charge ability deals additional damage when moving quickly.
Can use Rearing Strike for significant area damage.
Good AC for its CR, with effective defense against moderate attacks.
High Strength and hit points make it a resilient combatant.
